name: specweave
description: SpecWeave - Spec-Driven Development Framework. PM-led planning, intelligent model selection, living documentation, multi-tool support.

plugins.name: specweave
plugins.description: SpecWeave framework - increment lifecycle, living docs, PM-led planning

plugins.name: specweave-github
plugins.description: GitHub integration - bidirectional sync, issue tracking, task management

plugins.name: specweave-jira
plugins.description: JIRA integration - bidirectional sync with epics/stories

plugins.name: specweave-ado
plugins.description: Azure DevOps integration - bidirectional sync with work items

plugins.name: specweave-kubernetes
plugins.description: Kubernetes deployment - K8s manifests, Helm charts, GitOps

plugins.name: specweave-infrastructure
plugins.description: Cloud infrastructure - Hetzner, Prometheus, Grafana, monitoring

plugins.name: specweave-figma
plugins.description: Figma design system - MCP integration, design tokens, code generation

plugins.name: specweave-frontend
plugins.description: Frontend development - React, Vue, Angular, Next.js, design systems

plugins.name: specweave-backend
plugins.description: Backend development - Node.js, Python, .NET, REST APIs

plugins.name: specweave-payments
plugins.description: Payment processing - Stripe, PayPal, billing, PCI compliance

plugins.name: specweave-ml
plugins.description: Machine learning - ML pipelines, training, deployment

plugins.name: specweave-testing
plugins.description: Test execution infrastructure - Playwright E2E, browser automation, visual regression

plugins.name: specweave-tooling
plugins.description: SpecWeave tooling - skill creation, skill routing

plugins.name: specweave-alternatives
plugins.description: Framework alternative experts - Compare SpecWeave with BMAD, spec-kit, openspec. Gap analysis and recommendations.

plugins.name: specweave-ui
plugins.description: UI components and design systems - Reusable component libraries

plugins.name: specweave-cost-optimizer
plugins.description: Cost optimization - cloud platform comparison, cost breakdown

plugins.name: specweave-diagrams
plugins.description: Architecture diagrams - Mermaid, C4 Model, sequence, ER diagrams
